official_title: A joint resolution to authorize and request the President to issue a proclamation designating October 21 through 27, 1979, "National Energy Conservation Week".

summary.text: Authorizes and requests the President to designate October 21 through October 27, 1979, as "National Energy Conservation Week."

titles.title: A joint resolution to authorize and request the President to issue a proclamation designating October 21 through 27, 1979, "National Energy Conservation Week".
